title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Record-low ratings for Biden speech. Rush on why Biden's $6 trillion spending plan will fail just like Obama's. Government spending never leads to economic growth and Democrats know it. Massive spending is a slush fund for unions, flows back to Democrat Party. Rudy on the illegal raid on his apartment, he offered them the Hunter Biden hard drives, but they refused. Rush on the two-tiered system of justice we saw over and over again with Roger Stone, Paul Manafort, Trump associates. Rush monologue on how liberals want to replace the American Dream with class envy. Twitter allows racist "Uncle Tim" slur against Tim Scott to trend for hours. Rush: The real racism in America is on the left. Montage of Joe Biden's racist remarks over the years. James Golden, aka Bo Snerdley, on his new podcast series on Rush behind the scenes, debuting on May 12th. Zero Hedge: 34% of all household income in America comes from government.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

John Kerry treason story disappears. Rush reminds us that John Kerry thanked Iran for kidnapping American soldiers. Media tries to tell us Biden's age is a good thing. Rush on when the media renamed unemployment "fun-employment" during the Obama years. Rush on why Democrats like Joe Biden want you to pay higher gas prices. Road Trip with Rush: Dave 'Baby' Cortez and The Happy Organ. Open Line Friday callers. James Golden on the new Rush podcast. Biden projects weakness to the rest of the world.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush talks about the movie "Secretariat", which liberal critics bashed. Open Line Friday calls. Biden's proposed ban on menthol cigarettes faces backlash from the left on "social justice" grounds. Rush from 2008 when liberals excluded menthols from their regulations for reasons of race, politics. Montage of Rush shouting out the Highly Overrated EIB Staff. James Golden podcast debuts May 12th. Stay optimistic, fight socialism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
